summary: Young lovers in London are wrapped up in a love triangle that may not be exactly what it seems.
cast: Gael García Bernal|Natalia Verbeke|James D'Arcy|Tom Hardy|Charlie Cox|Yves Aubert|Myfanwy Waring|Michael Webber|Jonathan Kydd|Michael Elwyn|Len Collin|John Pearson|Tito Heredia|Olayo Gimenez|Richard Clifford|Mark Spalding|Paul Shelley|Graham McTavish|Michael Nardone|Jonathan Emmanuel|Tasha de Vasconcelos|David Decio|Ray Donn|Victoria Hollingsworth|Laurence Richardson|Ben Robinson
title: El punto sobre la i
